verses.roman:
tumi haṭha kaile tāṅra haṭha se bāḍibe
snāna bhojana kara, āpane krodha yābe"

synonyms: tumi haṭha kaile—if you go on persisting; tāṅra—His; haṭha—persistence; se—that; bāḍibe—will increase; snāna bhojana kara—take your bath and take prasāda; āpane krodha yābe—automatically His anger will subside.
translation: "The Lord is persisting, and if you also persist, His persistence will increase. It is better for you to bathe and take prasāda. In due course, His anger will automatically subside."
